title: Sabro-Vida
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Buffet, Salad bar, Bolivian
description: The weekday lunch costs around 15Bs and the Sunday meal 17Bs. Makes pizza on weekday evenings. Dairy is used, so vegans should ask. Pleasant and spacious, lofted dining area with murals of the jungle. A small market across the street sells soy products.
